## BaseFacetProps interface

Base props for a single facet component.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BaseFacetProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fieldId](./search-ui-react.basefacetprops.fieldid.md) | string | The fieldId corresponding to the facet |
|  [label?](./search-ui-react.basefacetprops.label.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The label of the facet. Defaults to facet's displayName if not provided. |
|  [transformOptions?](./search-ui-react.basefacetprops.transformoptions.md) | (options: DisplayableFacetOption\[\]) =&gt; DisplayableFacetOption\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> A function to transform facet's options. |
